features.title: Powerful Features

noDevice.title: No Extra Device Needed
noDevice.description: Use your existing smartphone. No need to buy additional hardware or controllers.

oneTap.title: One-Tap Shortcuts
oneTap.description: Execute keyboard shortcuts instantly with a single tap on your phone screen.

customPages.title: Custom Control Pages
customPages.description: Create and organize your shortcuts into custom pages for different workflows.

instant.description: Automatic discovery and pairing. Connect in seconds over your local network.

gaming.title: Gaming Control
gaming.description: Perfect for gamers. Control your games and streaming software with ease.

stream.title: Stream & Media Control
stream.description: Control OBS, media players, and streaming tools directly from your phone.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in three simple steps

step1.title: Download & Install
step1.description: Download the Local Desk desktop app and install it on your computer.

step2.title: Connect Your Phone
step2.description: Open the mobile app and it will automatically discover your desktop on the local network.

step3.title: Start Controlling
step3.description: Tap shortcuts on your phone to execute keyboard commands and launch apps on your desktop.
